document_data.name: Masulk's Tomb
document_data.mainbody:
'''Masulk's Tomb''' was the burial place of [[Masulk|Masulk the Magnificent]] located in the [[Far Forest]] in the [[Savage Frontier]].

{{quote|Let none hold back one ring or scroll, lest they suffer my secret curse, but let all be laid with me, under stone and under root, until the name of Masulk is as forgotten as it should be.|[[Masulk|Masulk the Magnificent]]}}
document_data.Description: The tomb was hidden by trees, shrubs and climbing plants, so it was hard to locate.
document_data.History: Masulk was a vizar stricken by a terrible and incurable disease. After he died, Masulk's servants dug the tomb as ordered by the master himself, where his [[carpet of flying|flying carpet]] came to rest. Masulk wanted to be buried with no coins, but with all the [[magic]] he'd accumulated during his lifetime.
